name: Lost (itch) (Raph Gamingz)
description: It is the year 3000 and you are a cyborg. You have taken off to go to planet ??? which has life. While in space you crash into a frozen planet like mars. You get off the rocketship in time to see the rocket blow up. The planet shoots out lots of rock to space. You land on a asteroid. You are stuck in space. Get materials from your broken rocketship to make another one to live and fly to your destination of planet???
